section.heading: Tax on corporations — Financial institutions included.

annotations.annotation: Section 15(b) of D.C. Law 19-53 provided that the act shall expire after 225 days of its having taken effect.
Section 2(b) of D.C. Law 19-53, in section 8074 of D.C. Law 19-21, substituted “for tax years beginning after December 31, 2010” for “as of December 31, 2010”.
